Fix Eclipse CI (#1256)
buggy_code: Process mvn_clean_test = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("mvn clean test", null,	new File(projectPath));
fixed_code: Process mvn_clean_test = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("mvn clean test", null, new File(projectPath));

commit_message: Fix Eclipse CI (#1256)
buggy_code: ArrayList<SequencerCollectorPatch> patches = filter.getCommitPatches(commit, filterMultiFile, contextSize, allRawFiles);
fixed_code: ArrayList<SequencerCollectorPatch> patches = filter.getCommitPatches(commit, filterMultiFile, contextSize, allRawFiles, repo);

commit_message: Fix Eclipse CI (#1256)

fix: fix bugs in SequencerRepair found with R-Hero (#1203)

Signed-off-by: Javier Ron <javierron90@gmail.com>
fix: fix double % (%%20) (#1051)
buggy_code: "If you don't want to receive those PRs in the future, [open an issue on Repairnator](https://github.com/eclipse/repairnator/issues/new?title=[BLACKLIST]%%20%(slug))" ;
fixed_code: "If you don't want to receive those PRs in the future, [open an issue on Repairnator](https://github.com/eclipse/repairnator/issues/new?title=[BLACKLIST]%(slug))" ;

Fix regression bugs in yesterday's commit (+test) (#902)

Fix another assertion in TestProjectInspector

fixed_code: assertThat(commit.getShortMessage(), containsString("End of the Repairnator process"));

commit_message:
Refactor repairnator.json generation (#715)

* Add implementation for reproductionBuggyBuild.machineInfo

* Add implementation for projectMetrics.numberLines

* Remove Metrics and MetricsSerializerAdapter, and start to use the new implementation for repairnator.json generation

* Start to change the tests on json files

* Fix compilation errors

* Add freeMemoryByStep in JobStatus

* Update bears schema

* Update test resources

* Fix CheckoutRepository

* Update test resources

* Work on tests

* Put fixing duration back

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Add FIXME

* Delete MetricsSerializer4Bears: MetricsSerializer is now enough for both Repairnator and Bears

* Rename MetricsSerializer to PropertiesSerializer

* Some change in PropertiesSerializer

* Do refactoring in ProjectInspector

* Init properties in ProjectInspector instead of CloneRepository

* Avoid to ask the LauncherMode in ProjectInspector

* Remove unused import

* Do some refactoring in the tests

* Do some more changes

* Do some more changes

* Update schemas in docker-images (the build is supposed to fail here in the checkbranches tests, I will create new branches after the failure)

* Fix merge

* Trigger a new build (the build should pass here, the testing branches are updated)

* Try to rename TestMetrics4BearsJsonFile again (I will undo that if this breaks the build)

* Fix serialization of freeMemoryByStep

* Leave TestMetrics4BearsJsonFile in peace forever

* Add FIXME
fixed_code: private String version; // this property is specific for bears.json

commit_message:
Refactor repairnator.json generation (#715)

* Add implementation for reproductionBuggyBuild.machineInfo

* Add implementation for projectMetrics.numberLines

* Remove Metrics and MetricsSerializerAdapter, and start to use the new implementation for repairnator.json generation

* Start to change the tests on json files

* Fix compilation errors

* Add freeMemoryByStep in JobStatus

* Update bears schema

* Update test resources

* Fix CheckoutRepository

* Update test resources

* Work on tests

* Put fixing duration back

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Add FIXME

* Delete MetricsSerializer4Bears: MetricsSerializer is now enough for both Repairnator and Bears

* Rename MetricsSerializer to PropertiesSerializer

* Some change in PropertiesSerializer

* Do refactoring in ProjectInspector

* Init properties in ProjectInspector instead of CloneRepository

* Avoid to ask the LauncherMode in ProjectInspector

* Remove unused import

* Do some refactoring in the tests

* Do some more changes

* Do some more changes

* Update schemas in docker-images (the build is supposed to fail here in the checkbranches tests, I will create new branches after the failure)

* Fix merge

* Trigger a new build (the build should pass here, the testing branches are updated)

* Try to rename TestMetrics4BearsJsonFile again (I will undo that if this breaks the build)

* Fix serialization of freeMemoryByStep

* Leave TestMetrics4BearsJsonFile in peace forever

* Add FIXME

Fix NPE in scanner launcher (#622)

This PR fixes a NPE in scanner launcher (I probably introduced that in some refactoring).
fixed_code: this.initConfig(arguments); // "this.config" is only available after this call, which initializes the config

commit_message: Fix some tests (#609)
buggy_code: BuildToBeInspected toBeInspected = new BuildToBeInspected(build, previousBuild, status, "");
fixed_code: BuildToBeInspected toBeInspected = new BuildToBeInspected(previousBuild, build, status, "");

commit_message:
Compute patch stats only on java files (#604)

Fix #601

Commit changed tests in a distinct commit when passing/passing builds (#584)

This PR intends to fix the issue #490.
A branch generated with the changes contained in this PR can be seen here: https://github.com/fermadeiral/bears-collection-pp/tree/INRIA-spoon-191511078-20170113-031556
The process is right (of committing changed tests in a distinct commit when passing/passing builds), but this branch, for instance, is not completely correct because of the issue #581. However, the two issues are different, thus I propose this PR for adding the feature for issue #490, and in another moment (PR) I will fix the bug reported in issue #581.

PS: One of the last commits is a bug fix (I introduced such bug when I extracted the method `copyDirectory`). Sorry for mixing it in this PR, but I needed to fix that to see if the things were working for the feature added in this PR.
patch:
@@ -4,5 +4,5 @@
  * Created by fernanda on 02/03/17.
  */
 public enum CheckoutType {
-    NO_CHECKOUT, CHECKOUT_PATCHED_BUILD, CHECKOUT_BUGGY_BUILD, CHECKOUT_BUGGY_BUILD_SOURCE_CODE
+    NO_CHECKOUT, CHECKOUT_PATCHED_BUILD, CHECKOUT_BUGGY_BUILD, CHECKOUT_BUGGY_BUILD_SOURCE_CODE, CHECKOUT_BUGGY_BUILD_TEST_CODE
 }

commit_message:
Commit changed tests in a distinct commit when passing/passing builds (#584)

This PR intends to fix the issue #490.
A branch generated with the changes contained in this PR can be seen here: https://github.com/fermadeiral/bears-collection-pp/tree/INRIA-spoon-191511078-20170113-031556
The process is right (of committing changed tests in a distinct commit when passing/passing builds), but this branch, for instance, is not completely correct because of the issue #581. However, the two issues are different, thus I propose this PR for adding the feature for issue #490, and in another moment (PR) I will fix the bug reported in issue #581.

PS: One of the last commits is a bug fix (I introduced such bug when I extracted the method `copyDirectory`). Sorry for mixing it in this PR, but I needed to fix that to see if the things were working for the feature added in this PR.

buggy_code: if (jobLog != null && jobLog.getTestsInformation() != null && jobLog.getTestsInformation().getErrored() >= 0 || jobLog.getTestsInformation().getFailing() >= 0) {

commit_message:
Repairnator works in executing in real time failing jobs from travis/jobs (#386)

* Improve JTravis to be able to retrieve a list of jobs

* Working on a new mode in repairnator to inspect in realtime travis/jobs

* Finish to code core of RT mechanism

* Add some more logs

* Ignore flaky test

* Add new script for repairnator realtime

* Fix checkstyle and change a bit the script launcher

* Fix the script

* Script: remove wrong arguments

* Fix issue with fasterxml.

* Init blacklist and whitelist. Fix error when appending to white/black list.

* Improve RTScanner when managing black/white lists

* Improve black and white lists

* Try to improve a bit perf

* Improve lists

* Fix error leading to duplication of builds

* Fix checkstyle

* Fix missing not ...

* Keep a cache of already observed builds in order to avoid replicating multiple times the build

* Avoid NPE in InspectJobs and filter a bit logs

* Ignore whitelisted log

* Improve blacklist and whitelist

* Avoid NPE and JsonException

* Add some serializer to get stats on explored repo/builds

* Allow to use engines to serialize builds

* Fix checkstyle
buggy_code: FAILED, PASSED, CREATED, STARTED, ERRORED, CANCELED
fixed_code: FAILED, PASSED, CREATED, STARTED, ERRORED, CANCELED, RECEIVED, QUEUED
patch:
@@ -6,5 +6,5 @@
  * @author Simon Urli
  */
 public enum BuildStatus {
-    FAILED, PASSED, CREATED, STARTED, ERRORED, CANCELED
+    FAILED, PASSED, CREATED, STARTED, ERRORED, CANCELED, RECEIVED, QUEUED
 }

 }

* Add a test for NPEFix step. Fix bugs.

Fix #293

Add NPEFix to librepair (#313)

* Start to add integration of NPE fix

* Parse NPEFix output. Create a specific state for NPEFix, and change the way patched build are computed for notifier/serializer.

* Fix checkstyle

* Add a test for NPEFix step. Fix bugs.

Fix #293

fix #298

* Fix a bug related with GitHub oAuth when using the API #295

fixed_code: RunnablePipelineContainer runnablePipelineContainer = new RunnablePipelineContainer(imageId, this.arguments.getString("repository"), branchName, this.arguments.getFile("output").getAbsolutePath(), this.arguments.getBoolean("skipDelete"));

commit_message: Add a unit test to show #253 and fix it (#254)
Fix a bug related to the commit patch URL

fixed_code: commitMsg += "This commit is a reflect of the following : "+metrics.getPatchCommitUrl()+".";

commit_message:
Improve metrics (#243)

* Create a new class to gather metrics

* Start to integrate metrics inside abstract step and properties.

* Start to add ways to compute number of files in the project

* Now we also compute metrics from Nopol, number of lines of code and changes in patch.

* Add a new step to compute number of test files.

* Add also information about tests and number of libraries

* Fix compilation error in serializer

* Fix compilation and checkstyle issues

* Add a type adapter for Metrics type

* Also commit / push metrics before leaving the pipeline

* Fix a bug with computeSourceDir

* Add a new serializer for metrics.

* Fix tests

* Fix other tests

* Fix checkstyle

* Improve commit messages

* Fix tests

* Still one test was failing, fix it.
Fix an error in init repo step

Fix an issue on ComputeSourceDir when having parent pom in multi-modu… (#236)

* Fix an issue on ComputeSourceDir when having parent pom in multi-module project. Slight optimization for commits of repairnator informations.

* Fix test squash repo

* Fix tests with checkout buggy build source code

Change checkout passing (#233)

* Change to use all source dir in the checkout for passing/passing #225

* Fix tests

* Change the way relativePath is computed in checkout repository

* Change test

* Fix checkstyle

* Change the vocabulary build/previousBuild to patchedBuild/buggyBuild. Also change repairnator mode to get patch build if it exists. And change bear mode to launch nopol.

* Fix tests

* Forgot one test...

* Change the build used in most of the classes: the buggy build should be used most of the time

* Explicit the names of checkout steps. Change the step in tests

* Change status of check out steps

* Fix condition in ProjectInspector

* Change the final expected step status for bears

* Should fix the last failing tests.

* Use proper solver to run repairnator. Fix order of builds in test4bears

* Change expected status for tests
patch:
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ public enum ProjectState {
     NONE, INIT,
     CLONABLE, NOTCLONABLE,
     BUILDCHECKEDOUT, BUILDNOTCHECKEDOUT,
-    PREVIOUSBUILDCHECKEDOUT, PREVIOUSBUILDNOTCHECKEDOUT,
+    PATCHEDBUILDCHECKEDOUT, PATCHEDBUILDNOTCHECKEDOUT,
     PREVIOUSBUILDCODECHECKEDOUT, PREVIOUSBUILDCODENOTCHECKEDOUT,
     BUILDABLE, NOTBUILDABLE,
     TESTABLE, NOTTESTABLE,
